title: Letters from the Well
description: 'The scarf was so pretty: the finest, thinnest web of fabric embroidered with countless flowers in a thousand colours. Who could blame Mantha for trying to reach it as it floated across the garden on the lightest breeze and settled over the winch above the well? And then she slipped and fell - into another world.'When Mantha falls into a well she finds herself in another world, a faeryland that is threatened by a dark sorceress. In our world, she appears to be in a coma, but when her sister, Tash, begins to receive letters from the well she learns the truth about Mantha. They must each go on their own adventure if Mantha is to be saved, and time is running out.'Letters from the Well' is an adventure story for children and young adult readers.
author: Simone Solon
